title: ISplitLineFeatureData.PullDirectionType
description: Gets the type of entity indicating the direction of pull for this split line feature.
returns: Type of entity as defined in swSelectType_e : swSelDATUMAXES swSelEDGES swSelFACES swSelDATUMPLANES swSelDATUMPOINT swSelVERTICES
remarks:
Before calling this property, call
ISplitLineFeatureData::PullDirectionBase
to get the entity that indicates the pull direction.
